name: Bandai Dragon Ball Goku Limit Breaker 30 cm
description:
Unleash the power of the Saiyan Prince with the BANDAI Dragon Ball Goku Limit Breaker 30 cm figure, a must-have collectible for any true Dragon Ball fan. This impressive figure captures Goku in stunning detail, ready to unleash his legendary Kamehameha attack.

Standing tall at 30 cm, this Goku figure is impossible to miss. It´s the perfect size to make a statement on your shelf, desk, or display case. The dynamic pose and intricate sculpting bring Goku´s signature fighting stance to life, making you feel like you´ve stepped right into the Dragon Ball universe.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the figure showcases Goku´s iconic orange gi with incredible accuracy. Every fold, wrinkle, and stitch is faithfully recreated, highlighting the high-quality craftsmanship of this collectible. The vibrant colors and paint applications further enhance the figure´s realism, making it a true standout piece in any collection.

But this Goku figure is more than just a pretty face. It´s built for action! Featuring multiple points of articulation, you can pose Goku in a variety of dynamic stances, recreating your favorite fight scenes from the anime or manga. Imagine Goku launching a devastating Kamehameha, dodging Friez´s attacks, or powering up to Super Saiyan – the possibilities are endless!

The BANDAI Dragon Ball Goku Limit Breaker 30 cm figure is the perfect gift for any Dragon Ball enthusiast, collector, or fan of anime figures. It´s a piece that´s sure to spark conversations and ignite the passion of any Dragon Ball fan.

Add this incredible Goku figure to your collection today and experience the power of Dragon Ball like never before!
